attributes.action: DO NOT proscribe the English Defence League.
attributes.additional_details: If it is right to have a live petition asking for the EDL to be proscribed it must also be right for there to be a live petition asking for the EDL NOT to be proscribed?  When compared to the actions of our dishonourable electeds, the EDL might by our only remaining last hope to get out of the debacle we have now become as a society and a country under CamerClegg/McBroon and Bliar (THAT PROVES THIS IS NOT A PARTY POLITICAL PETITION, MERELY ONE FOR EQUITABLE TREATMENT UNDER THE HUMAN RIGHTS ACT).
